content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy The Lord Dearing Awards have been running since 1999 and recognise the exceptional contributions made by university staff to the student experience. Supported by Lord Ronald Dearing, the university's fifth Chancellor, the awards have honoured hundreds of individuals, teams, schools and departments over the years. Any staff member, team or faculty school or department that you believe has made a significant impact on your experience can be nominated in one of the following categories: You can nominate one or more individual or team. Once nominated, nominees can choose whether to proceed with an award submission application. Submissions are then reviewed by interim and final panels to determine award outcomes. Nominations close on Friday 29 November and awards will be conferred in the summer of 2025. Communications and Marketing University Park Campus Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone:+44 (0)115 82 32353 e: studentcommsoffice@nottingham.ac.uk
